summary: This is a home mod For TES V: Skyrim Note: IF YOU HAVEN'T PLAYED THE VOLKIHAR QUEST LINE DO NOT READ DESCRIPTION, Possible Spoliers
descriptionHtml:
This mod is called SilentStone It is obtainable once you gain access to Valerica's study, Go out onto the balcony, were you will encounter an ancient vampire, The Key is on his body

I have not set up any custom chests Yet, I plan to update ASAP

Is it nav-meshed?
Yes and no, it is copied from the east tower so yes, but the nav-mesh may be broken
I would not suggest bringing in followers

I want something added D: 
Send them: ElementalProductions@outlook.com
author: ElementalProductions
